text: In du ʙahr ʙaroʙar nestand: jake oʙas sirinu guvorost va jake suru talx. Az hardu gusti (mohi) toza mexured va az onho cizhoe ʙaroi oroisi tani xes (az durru marcon) ʙerun mekased va meʙini kistihoro ʙaroi joftani rizqu ruzi va ƣanimat, ki oʙro mesikofand va pes maravand, to sumo az fazli Alloh rizqu ruzi talaʙed va ʙosad, ki sipostuzor ʙosed
